title: Ticket #3140: Redundant code in remote_startup.c / syscall lib / checkpointing
description:
remote_startup.c (used during startup of a condor_compiled program) has some redundant code. In MAIN, the argument -_condor_D_* is parsed twice, once around line 368, and once around line 413. They appear redundant.

Verify redundancy and remove one.

The two sections of code (ignoring their comments) look like this: 

if( (strncmp(arg, "D_", 2) == MATCH) ) {
	_condor_set_debug_flags( arg, 0 );
	continue;
}
